Text:
Ah Cutie Honey eh?
I do remember trying this out on the dvd purchace, and got enough smiles out of it/her/anime.
Reason for this comment? Wanted to thank yo for stating:
* English subtitles CANNOT be turned off (warning you beforehand)
Thanks for having the common sense and attitude for the bloody important point. 
Thanks, will see what else ya got in the land of anime...
